name: tabular-playground-series-mar-2022
data_intro: For the March edition of the 2022 Tabular Playground Series you're challenged to forecast twelve-hours of traffic flow in a U.S. metropolis. The time series in this dataset are labelled with both location coordinates and a direction of travel -- a combination of features that will test your skill at spatio-temporal forecasting within a highly dynamic traffic network.

cat_feature_intro.time: the 20-minute period in which each measurement was taken
cat_feature_intro.direction: the direction of travel of the roadway. EB indicates 'eastbound' travel, for example, while SW indicates a 'southwest' direction of travel.

num_feature_intro.row_id: a unique identifier for this instance
num_feature_intro.congestion: congestion levels for the roadway during each hour; the target. The congestion measurements have been normalized to the range 0 to 100.
num_feature_intro.x: the east-west midpoint coordinate of the roadway
num_feature_intro.y: the north-south midpoint coordinate of the roadway
